transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir good morning Vasundhara bol rahi hu India mart se kaise hai aap?
Customer: Ji ji badhiya hai badhiya hai.
Executive: Accha sir apna services chal rahi hai India mart pe aapka ek feedback aaya tha abhi ki aapki services deactivate karani hai refund chahiye aapka business close ho gaya right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay sir actually mai ye puchna chahungi abhi aise do mahine pehle hi aapne services register karai thi September mein.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To kya issue aa gaya ki services aapna business close ho gaya?
Customer: Main is sector mein naya tha, main is sector mein naya tha mam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ayurvedic sector mein naya tha mam to mere ko ye kaam samajh mein nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Isiliye main is sector ko ab change kar diya band kar diya.
Executive: Nahi to ye bataiye koi product line change ki aapne to wo product line change ki aap wo use yaha pe bhi update kar sakte ho.
Executive: Aisa hai ki aap
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Jaise agar aapne ye jo moringa powders vagarah moringa leaf capsule mein deal karte the, theek hai agar aap is product range mein nahi deal kar rahe ho aapki koi aur naye product aapne start kiya hai kuch aur business start kiya hai wo yaha pe aap update kar sakte ho sir.
Customer: Nahi mam.
Customer: Nahi mam wo bhi band kar diya mam India mart pe mujhe nahi karna hai abhi main offline kar raha hu mam.
Executive: Sir wo acchi baat hai lekin India mart pe dekhiye koi refund policy nahi hai hamare paas ki hum aapki service band karke refund kar de.
Customer: Mam abhi teen mahine pehle unhone account manager se kaha unhone kaha teen mahine pehle ho sakti hai to abhi 30 tarikh ko teen mahine honge.
Executive: Kaun kaun account manager ne aapko kaha tha sir?
Customer: Account manager mere Vishal aise kuch hai Vishal.
Executive: Vishal thodi na aapko koi bolega sir ki teen mahine service use kijiye uske baad band kara sakte hai usse pehle. Sir India mart pe refund policy nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi band nahi karana.
Executive: Haan?
Executive: Kya bol rahe hai sir?
Customer: Mam balance to bacha hoga na main jitna use kiya hounga utna kaat ke.
Executive: Balance to bacha hai lekin hamari bhi to kuch policy hoti hai sir jiske beyond hum nahi ja sakte. Wahi main aapko bata rahi hu ki hamare paas aisi koi bhi policy nahi hai jaha ki aapki jo running services hai use band band karna hai aapki band ho jayegi band ho jati hai aap nahi use karoge to automatically band hi hai wo lekin refund policy nahi hoti hai ki wo paisa refund ho aapko sir isme.
Customer: Aisa kaun sa policy hai?
Executive: Koi bhi sales team nahi bolti hai sir ki service subscription subscription lene ke baad agar nahi ho to wo utna edit deti hai na kitne din tak use kariye agar nahi accha laga to phir band kar dijiyega.
Executive: Sir refund policy nahi hai agar hoti to hum karwa dete sir.
Executive: Aap dekh lijiye aap jo right product mein deal karte ho aap jo offline deal kar rahe hai sir usse online karke dekh lo kuch problem thodi na hai usme sir.
Executive: But agar refund policy hoti to phir hum aapko karwa dete but India mart pe refund policy nahi hai sir. Aur aap jis product mein deal kar rahe hai aisa bhi nahi hai is market mein business nahi hai India mart pe. Accha khasa business hai bahut sare supplier register hai hamare paas.
Executive: Theek hai mam abhi continue kar dijiyega.
Executive: To main to aapko wahi bolungi Vishal se main bolungi ki aapko wo leads vagarah share kare aap properly sare leads use karo buyers se baat karo follow up karo theek hai quotation vagarah bhejo aur jo inquiry aayi un sab pe reply karke baat karo ek bhi call miss mat kariyega. Jitna aap properly service use karoge utna accha response milega.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Acchi bataiye aapne aapke jo product mein aap deal kar rahe ho aapne kabhi online check kiya hai sir aapke kaun kaun se computer baithe hue hai India mart pe?
Executive: Ji pata hai aapke aapke product line mein na hamare paas industry leader wali company baithe hui hai jinhone industry leader ka package liya hai matlab jo ki India mart pe ek saal ke liye 15 se 20 lakh rupees kharch karte hai apne business promotion ke liye.
Executive: Theek hai uske niche reading supply ki listing aati hai to itne sare supplier baithe hai sir accha khasa business mil raha hai India mart se aur kafi accha scope hai is business mein product line mein.
Executive: Theek hai baki ka aap services properly use karoge to aapko bahut accha business dekhne ko milega.
Customer: Okay okay okay mam.
Executive: Theek hai are sir ye bataiye ki leads kaun aap aap hi use karte hai sari leads vagarah ya koi aur bhi hai aapke yaha pe lead vagarah use?
Customer: Haan ji hum hi lead use karte hai.
Customer: Haan ji actually lead hum hi lead karte hai mam.
Executive: Aap hi use karte hai. Accha to jaise aap lead jo aati hai na koshish kiya kijiye hamesha lead zero se char ghante ke beech mein usse pehle jitni jaldi aap consume karoge ek lead ko aapko utna hi accha conversion aur response milega us lead se.
Executive: Theek hai abhi dekhiye ek lead aayi hai aapke paas.
Customer: Call aa raha hai mam aapko call back se.
Executive: To sir aapka ye feedback aaya tha ticket wo main close kar du abhi?
Customer: Haan abhi mam close kar dijiyega abhi nahi cancel karna.
Executive: Theek hai main close kar deti hu baki ke sir just abhi ek lead aayi hai 500 kg ki Aurangabad Maharashtra se to ek baar consume kar lo use acchi lead hai turant aayi hai abhi.
Customer: Theek hai mam dekhta hu.
Executive: Theek hai chaliye ye feedback main aapka close kar rahi hu aapke paas ek mail aayega satisfaction ke liye usse aap satisfy kar dijiyega abhi aapko close nahi karana hai theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to deactivate services and refund.

- Customer is new to the Ayurvedic sector.



Resolution:

- Executive explained no refund policy.

- Executive suggested continuing services and using leads.

- Executive offered to close the feedback ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to continue services.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, leads, business
